trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Stara Zagora
There were no other sightings in Stara Zagora on or around August 17th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI sleeping, when I suddenly get up. I couldn`t get to sleep. I go to terrace to look the stars. In front of me, near to big house I see the UFO. It is look like ball with orange light. From UFO get out and get in smaller ball. I did not scare. Only want to sleep. After 2 nights I see it again but in different place. It was in front of me (I was in the bed). I see it for 4-5 sec and fall asleep. After 2 nights I see it again. But this it was very far (you can see it on the photo). I look it 40 min. It was moving. But it is hide behind a big building.
Summary: Looks like a ball with orange light.
